name: At a cafe with your best friend
name_original: At a cafe with your best friend
description:
Summary

Exist as a person who is at a cafe with their best friend.  You can look around the cafe, write in your journal, or talk to your friend.  This is a safe space to talk and ‘be alone with someone’.

Controls

Mouse to look, click to interact, space to read, numbers to select dialogue options, keyboard to type.

Artist Statement

I want to capture the feeling of being in a safe space with the person you love the most.  Both of you are sitting down, doing your own thing, separate yet together.  Every now and then you look up to the other and talk about life, or tell them how much you love them, or give them a gentle touch.  You’re so happy to just be with them.
